The study answer research question V-Motive 's ability perform intend function : allow interventionists feasibly leverage video modeling within ABA therapy minimal amount overhead labor .

The goal evaluate feasibility , usability , potential V-Motive deliver comprehensive , individualized video modeling integrate child 's program . Investigators also use descriptive statistic provide preliminary insight potential impact system child 's performance ABA therapy . However , data NOT intend show cause show effectiveness . The study answer follow question : 1 ) 3 ) Can V-Motive feasibly use ABA therapy positively impact child 's performance within 4 week ? 2 ) How laborious construct fully-indexed video repository therapy footage use V-Motive ? 3 ) How accurate system suggest cue appropriate video playback demand ?
